name: show-me-your-github
description: show programming language based on the repos of github's account

scripts.test:screenshot: concurrently --success first --kill-others "export PORT=5001 && npm start" "casperjs test tests/screenshot-testing/suite.js --debug=true --engine=slimerjs --verbose --log-level=debug --xunit=build/screenshot-testing/results.xml"
